title: AeroDesk LIVE: Real-Time Airport & Flight Tracker Dashboard Using React.js, OpenLayers, and Aviation Edge API
description: AeroDesk LIVE is a real-time airport and flight tracker dashboard providing live arrivals, departures, and weather insights for airports worldwide. Built with React.js, OpenLayers, and RESTful APIs, it integrates the Aviation Edge API for flight schedules and nearby airports, along with the OpenWeather API for live weather data. The dashboard includes interactive maps, dynamic charts, and searchable airport data, allowing users to visualize air traffic and explore airport details. Using tz-lookup and Luxon, it offers accurate local time conversions for tracking the longest and shortest flights.

title: Automated End-to-End ETL Workflow for European Air Traffic Data Lake Creation Using FME
description: This project implements a fully automated end-to-end ETL pipeline using FME Desktop to build a real-time EU air traffic data lake. It combines flight arrival and departure data from the Aviation Edge API with detailed geo-spatial airport information from OpenAIP and OurAirports. The workflow extracts, transforms, and loads dynamic flight data into a scalable GeoJSON data lake, enabling timely analytics. Automation through Windows Task Scheduler ensures twice-daily updates, supporting comprehensive analysis of daily, monthly, seasonal, and annual aviation traffic in the EU via a generated dashboard and Python-based data analysis using GeoPandas.

title: HealthNearMe: Real-Time Healthcare Search App Using WebGIS, React.js, and Geoapify RESTful API
description: HealthNearMe is a web-based GIS application built with React and Leaflet.js that helps users quickly find nearby healthcare services. It integrates live geolocation and place data using the Geoapify API, including Autocomplete and Geocoding features for accurate location search. The app displays detailed place information with Leaflet marker clustering for dense areas. Users can apply multiple filters—such as category, distance, name, facilities, and opening hours—to refine results. The responsive UI is powered by React Bootstrap, ensuring a user-friendly experience across devices.

title: Responsive Personal Portfolio Website Built with React
description: This modern, fully responsive web portfolio showcases my projects, technical skills, blog posts, and professional background. It features smooth animations, interactive elements, and is optimized for high performance on desktop and mobile devices. With a focus on clean UI/UX, accessibility, and intuitive navigation, it offers a seamless experience. All dynamic content is loaded from external JSON files.

title: VerticalGeoVis - Web Application (Master Thesis Project)
description: This project presents a web application for visualizing the vertical context of the 10 most populated German cities. It integrates vertical attributes into a single interface using data from the DBpedia Live Sync API and UBA Air Data API (v3.0.0). Data is structured in 2D/3D arrays, stored as JSON, and visualized using D3.js Zoomable Circle Packing, Spiral-type Leaflet Markers, and a tabular view. User interactions and task completion times are tracked via LimeSurvey. Results are statistically analyzed using the bootES R package to evaluate the effectiveness of each visualization method for conveying vertical context of geographic locations.

title: nearPointR-R Package for Real-Time Location based services using Geoapify API with Leaflet
description: nearPointR is an R package offering real-time location-based services using the Geoapify API and Leaflet for interactive maps. It allows users to visualize their current location, explore nearby points of interest like restaurants and pharmacies, download location data in CSV, GeoJSON, or KML formats, and navigate to the closest location via Google Maps. With customizable basemaps and categories, nearPointR provides an efficient, user-friendly tool for spatial analysis, data sharing, and navigation within R environments such as R Studio and R Markdown.

title: BlackJack-2Player (Player vs Computer) written in JavaScript
description: BlackJack-2Player is a browser-based game where the player competes against the computer in classic Blackjack. Developed with HTML5, JavaScript (ES5), CSS3, and Bootstrap 3.3, it features responsive design and smooth animations. Core logic uses arrays, objects, and classes. Built in Visual Studio Code, version-controlled with Git/GitHub, and deployed via GitHub Pages.

title: Data-Driven Insights on Natural Gas in the European Economic Area (1991-2020) Using ETL & Data Visualization
description: Built an end-to-end ETL pipeline and static visualizations to analyze natural gas consumption, production, exports, imports, reserves, and trends across EEA countries using FME, Python, and Jupyter. Leveraged Pandas, GeoPandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn for efficient data processing and insightful geographic and temporal visualizations.

title: Spatial Database Design and Query Optimization using PostgreSQL, PostGIS and ArcGIS Pro
description: Modeled an ERD during the conceptual design stage with spatial attributes (POINT, LINESTRING, POLYGON). Used PostgreSQL, PostGIS, and ArcGIS Pro to build a spatial database assessing highway blasting impacts on nearby structures. Integrated spatial and non-spatial data, optimized queries, and visualized results to support safety planning, regulatory compliance, and data-driven decision-making.
